abstract: Rusal, the world’s largest aluminum company, has threatened to sue the country’s leading business newspaper for publishing leaked information before an initial public offering.
snippet: Rusal, the world’s largest aluminum company, has threatened to sue the country’s leading business newspaper for publishing leaked information before an initial public offering.
lead_paragraph: MOSCOW  A major Russian mining company has threatened to sue the country’s leading business newspaper for publishing leaked information before an initial public offering.

headline.main: Russian Mining Company Threatens to Sue a Paper
headline.print_headline: Russian Mining Company Threatens to Sue a Paper
